cmp: 拍 (to clap/to pat/to beat/to hit/to slap/to take (a picture))

exm.mng: (onom.) for crack, slap, clap, clatter etc
onomat. for crack, slap, clap, clatter etc
variant of 批哩啪啦[pī li pā la]
variant of 批哩啪啦[pī li pā la]
see 噼裡啪啦|噼里啪啦[pi1 li5 pa1 la1]
(onom.) sound of object falling into water, plop
to crackle (of firecrackers etc) (onomatopoeia), to splutter
variant of 噼裡啪啦|噼里啪啦[pi1 li5 pa1 la1]
(onom.) to crackle and rattle, to pitter-patter
variant of 噼裡啪啦|噼里啪啦[pi1 li5 pa1 la1]
